Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to excluding income from the employment of children when calculating income for the selection of tenants
Summary: Relates to excluding income from the employment of children when calculating income for the selection of tenants; excludes income from the employment of children under 18 and full-time students over 18 and earnings in excess of $480 per month.
LawCode: Amd ยง156, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to income from employment of children
